text: Olga Knyazeva (; 9 August 1954 - 3 January 2015) was a Soviet fencer from Kazan. She won a gold medal in the women's team foil event at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Knyazeva died on 3 January 2015 in Kazan, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Olga Knyazeva at Sports- Reference Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Soviet fencers Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sportspeople from Kazan
title: Olga Knyazeva
